User story: 18244, Store a big thing(150k) using REST API

!3 Constants
!| script             |data utility                                      |
|$thingtypeid=        |return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0879|
|$thingtypeid_invalid=|return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0000|
|$productnumber1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserial1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserialxml=   |create random string                              |

!2 Create Clean Thing (createThing)

!| script           |post request        |
|set url            |$REST_BASEURL/things|
|set expected status|201                 |
|set body                                |!-
{
	"thingType": {
		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},
	"attributes": {
		"TimestampGenerated": "2014/09/16 00:00:01 UTC",
		"CollectorType": "STaTS Bridge",
		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |



!3 Constants
!| script             |data utility                                      |
|$thingtypeid=        |return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0879|
|$thingtypeid_invalid=|return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0000|

|$productserial1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserialxml=   |create random string                              |

!2 Create Clean Thing (createThing)

!| script           |post request        |
|set url            |$REST_BASEURL/things|
|set expected status|201                 |
|set body                                |!-

		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},

		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!2 Create Clean Thing (createThing)

!| script           |post request        |
|set url            |$REST_BASEURL/things|
|set expected status|201                 |
|set body                                |!-
{
	"thingType": {
		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},
	"attributes": {
		"TimestampGenerated": "2014/09/16 00:00:01 UTC",
		"CollectorType": "STaTS Bridge",
		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!| script           |post request        |
|set url            |$REST_BASEURL/things|
|set expected status|201                 |
|set body                                |!-
{
	"thingType": {
		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},
	"attributes": {
		"TimestampGenerated": "2014/09/16 00:00:01 UTC",
		"CollectorType": "STaTS Bridge",
		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|

|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!| script           |post request        |
|set url            |$REST_BASEURL/things|
|set expected status|201                 |
|set body                                |!-
{
	"thingType": {
		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},
	"attributes": {
		"TimestampGenerated": "2014/09/16 00:00:01 UTC",
		"CollectorType": "STaTS Bridge",
		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |



!3 Constants
!| script             |data utility                                      |
|$thingtypeid=        |return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0879|
|$thingtypeid_invalid=|return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0000|
|$productnumber1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserial1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserialxml=   |create random string                              |

!2 Create Clean Thing (createThing)

!| script             |data utility                                      |
|$thingtypeid=        |return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0879|
|$thingtypeid_invalid=|return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0000|
|$productnumber1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserial1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserialxml=   |create random string                              |

!2 Create Clean Thing (createThing)

!| script           |post request        |
|set url            |$REST_BASEURL/things|
|set expected status|201                 |
|set body                                |!-
{
	"thingType": {
		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},
	"attributes": {
		"TimestampGenerated": "2014/09/16 00:00:01 UTC",
		"CollectorType": "STaTS Bridge",
		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |



!3 Constants
!| script             |data utility                                      |
|$thingtypeid=        |return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0879|
|$thingtypeid_invalid=|return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0000|
|$productnumber1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserial1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserialxml=   |create random string                              |

!2 Create Clean Thing (createThing)

!| script           |post request        |
|set url            |$REST_BASEURL/things|
|set expected status|201                 |
|set body                                |!-
{
	"thingType": {
		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},
	"attributes": {
		"TimestampGenerated": "2014/09/16 00:00:01 UTC",
		"CollectorType": "STaTS Bridge",
		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",

		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |

		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},
	"attributes": {
		"TimestampGenerated": "2014/09/16 00:00:01 UTC",
		"CollectorType": "STaTS Bridge",
		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |





!3 Constants
!| script             |data utility                                      |
|$thingtypeid=        |return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0879|
|$thingtypeid_invalid=|return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0000|
|$productnumber1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserial1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserialxml=   |create random string                              |

|set body                                |!-

|$thingtypeid=        |return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0879|
|$thingtypeid_invalid=|return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0000|
|$productnumber1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserial1=     |create random string                              |
|$productserialxml=   |create random string                              |

!2 Create Clean Thing (createThing)

!| script           |post request        |
|set url            |$REST_BASEURL/things|
|set expected status|201                 |
|set body                                |!-
{
	"thingType": {
		"uuid": "$thingtypeid"
	},
	"attributes": {
		"TimestampGenerated": "2014/09/16 00:00:01 UTC",
		"CollectorType": "STaTS Bridge",
		"Manufacturer": "",
		"ProductSerialNumber": "$productserial1",
		"CollectorVersion": "4.84 Jan 03 2013",
		"ProductNumber": "$productnumber1",
		"ProductModel": "T400",
		"Hostname": "USE2195937"
	}
}
-!|
|check      |execute post request|true              |
|$thinguuid=|check jsonpath      |uuid       |      |
|$selfhref= |check jsonpath      |$._links.self.href|
|show       |get response body                      |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Verification: Check if Thing got created (Retrieve thing by it's identifier)
!| script |get request                                              |
|set url  |$selfhref                                                |
|get value|$selfhref     |from pool          |ComputeHelionThingHref|
|ensure   |execute get request                                      |
|check    |check jsonpath|attributes.Hostname|USE2195937            |
|show     |get response body                                        |
|show               |get header x tracking id |

!3 Constants
!| script             |data utility                                      |
|$thingtypeid=        |return string|abbb767a-cc40-4a4f-b55d-c55bf55c0879|

!2 List All Things (findAllThings)
!| script|get request             |
|set url |$REST_BASEURL/things  |
|check   |execute get request|true|
--|show    |get response body       |
|show               |get header x tracking id |
